Uses of Package
io.github.rowak

  • Packages that use io.github.rowak 
    Package Description
    io.github.rowak  
    io.github.rowak.effectbuilder  
  • Classes in io.github.rowak used by io.github.rowak 
    Class and Description
    Aurora
    The primary class in the API.
    Aurora.Effects
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora effects information.
    Aurora.ExternalStreaming
    Contains methods for controlling the external streaming feature on the Aurora.
    Aurora.Panel
    Represents a single Aurora light panel.
    Aurora.PanelLayout
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora panel layout information.
    Aurora.Position
    Represents a position on the Aurora panel grid.
    Aurora.Rhythm
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora Rhythm information.
    Aurora.State
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora state information.
    Effect
    A local interface for an Aurora Effect.
    Effect.Color
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
    Effect.Direction
    The available effect direction types.
    Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
    Effect.Type
    The availbale effect types.
    Note: The plugin type is for user-made plugin effect types.
    StatusCodeException
    A generic exception for an HTTP request error.
    StatusCodeException.InternalServerErrorException
    Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 500 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException
    Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 404 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
    Thrown whenever the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
    Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 422 status code response.
  • Classes in io.github.rowak used by io.github.rowak.effectbuilder 
    Class and Description
    Aurora
    The primary class in the API.
    Aurora.Panel
    Represents a single Aurora light panel.
    Effect
    A local interface for an Aurora Effect.
    Effect.Color
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
    Effect.Direction
    The available effect direction types.
    Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
    Effect.Frame
    Stores a frame's RGBW color and transition time.
    StatusCodeException
    A generic exception for an HTTP request error.
    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
    Thrown whenever the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
